title: Reorganisation
mainText: {kw:Effect} — After your draw step, add one counter to this event. Draw up to three cards and then put that many cards on top of your draw pile.{n}{n}{kw:Resolve}{r:vp=2} — trash this card.
flavourText: Sometimes you have all the nails in the world, but none of the hammers. - Marg, the Legendary Smith
